exceptions.exn: In environment instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : subcode.code instr st : state H : out_code (fst st) P st' : state Hcontra : P // st :1> st' H0 : nat Unable to unify "nat" with "False".

exceptions.tactic: destruct (sss_dec i st st') as [Hstep | Hnstep].
